meanings.definition: The area near a fireplace where people sit to keep warm.
meanings.sent1: We gathered around the fireside to toast marshmallows.
meanings.sent2: The family dog loves napping by the fireside.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to steal a seat by the fireside, but the dog beat her to it!
meanings.sent4: As the flames danced in the fireplace, the fireside seemed to come alive.
meanings.sent5: The crackling sounds of the fireside were soothing on a chilly evening.

meanings.definition: A cozy spot next to a fire.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, I love relaxing by the fireside with a good book.
meanings.sent2: The fireside in the cabin was the perfect place to unwind after a hike.
meanings.sent3: The fireside was so warm and inviting that I almost fell asleep in my chair.
meanings.sent4: The flickering light from the fireside cast a warm glow across the room.
meanings.sent5: The crackling fire at the fireside filled the room with a comforting warmth.
